This is a simple news module with tabs. It supports unlimited tabs and html text. This means that you can add as many news articles as you want here, or you can use this for any other purpose.

Because of the html text, you can embed pictures or even swf files and format your text in the way you want.

HTML gives you much more advantages, such as hyperlinks : www.flashden.net, and unordered lists:
  • the entire design can be customized via xml
  • to use, you just need to embed it in your html page..
  • ..and change the xml file(add your own articles)
  • never open the Flash file!

Long content comes here only gibberish matters now because nothing makes sense. You are keep reading this because you think that's interesting, but it's not. House, dog, cat, tv, subwoofer, laptop, bugs, car, telephone, door, school, heart, shoe, hear, microsoft, these are only words. Words that make this text field look bigger so you can see the scrollbar in action. Do you like the scrollbar? Or it is just the scrollbar that likes you? Anyway, this is not enough for you to test the scrollbar, so i will use another thing to yes, no, long, speed, graphic, color, blue, eye, paper, lamp, and me saying words again. But i am really just typing whatever comes out of my mouth. Is this enough? No.. It is never enough. It doesn't matter what's the subject, it is in our nature to be music, bus, yellow, guitar, pedal, socks, plates, earth, human, window, wolf, game, ice cream, sun, rain, and a lot of other words that compose our vocabulary.
